items.content_html: Observable Module This is a lightweight and reusable Observable module inspired by React hooks. It provides a simple way to observe changes to an object's properties and subscribe to those changes using callback functions.

items.content_html: The simplest way to deploy static websites, web apps, services, IoT projects without any vendor lock-in. Lightweight alternative to Kubernetes and PaaS(Heroku, Render and others). Deploy web projects on virtually any cloud provider/Raspberry Pi/old laptop in minutes.
